title: A Short Romance
content: An older couple was lying in bed one night. The husband was falling asleep when the wife leaned over and said, 'I love you.' The husband replied, 'Is that you, or the whiskey talking?' The wife answered, 'Itâ€™s me, talking to the whiskey.'

title: The Little Lesson
content: A child once asked his father why people are different. The father told him: 'We are all chapters in a big book. Each chapter teaches a different lesson.' The child smiled and promised to read more.
